DOC.brief_summary: This project seek determine whether estradiol suppression achieve adjuvant treatment aromatase inhibitor improve end-follicular luteal phase parameter IVF . 128 patient randomize either placebo active treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Addition Aromatase Inhibitor Ovarian Stimulation Therapy IVF Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study investigate whether detrimental effect ovarian stimulation outcome fresh embryo transfer cycle ameliorate co-treatment aromatase inhibitor ? The research question : 1 . Can impact ovarian stimulation late follicular phase sex steroid level ( hence endometrial receptivity ) mitigate co-treatment aromatase inhibitor ovarian stimulation ? 2 . Does co-treatment aromatase inhibitor 'normalize ' endocrinology luteal phase
DOC.criteria: Indication IVF treatment : tubal , male , medical Antral follicle count ( AFC ) 10 25 included Age < 40 Previous anticipate poor response ovarian stimulation IVF < 4 oocyte obtain ≥ 3 previous IVF cycle result pregnancy ( negative shCG ) Anti Müllerian Hormone ( AMH ) < 4 pmol ( ) Cycle day ( CD ) 23 Follicle Stimulating Hormone > 12 Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Smoking BMI ≥ 31 Risk developping Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome Allergy towards drug
